deleteConfirmation.title: Delete Confirmation
deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?

editExercise.title: Edit Exercise
editExercise.message: Click save to update your exercise or cancel to discard your changes.

createExercise.title: Create Exercise
createExercise.message: Click create to add this exercise or cancel to discard it.

editWorkoutExerciseSettings.title: Edit {{workoutName}} - {{exerciseName}} settings
editWorkoutExerciseSettings.message: Click save to update the settings for {{workoutName}} - {{exerciseName}} or cancel to discard your changes.

discardChanges.title: Discard changes
discardChanges.message: Are you sure you want to discard the changes you have made and go back to your workouts?

discardWorkoutResults.title: Discard Workout Results
discardWorkoutResults.message: Click confirm to discard your workout result from this workout session.

adjustWorkoutSettings.title: Adjust Workout Settings
adjustWorkoutSettings.message: Click on confirm to adjust the settings for {{name}} or cancel to discard your changes.

saveWorkoutResultsAndRestartWorkout.title: Save and Restart
saveWorkoutResultsAndRestartWorkout.message: Click on confirm to save your results and restart the workout.

saveWorkoutResultsAndExitWorkout.title: Save and Exit
saveWorkoutResultsAndExitWorkout.message: Click confirm to save your workout and exit the current workout session!

login.failure: You have failed to log in! ({{errorCode}}: {{errorMessage}})

logout.failure: You have failed to log out!

registration.passwordTooWeak: Your password is too weak! (minimum 6 characters is required)
registration.successful: You have successfully registered your FSTG account! Please check your inbox to verify your email address!

resetPassword.emailSent: Password reset link has been sent! Please check your mail!
resetPassword.emailError: Password reset link could not be sent. Please wait a moment and try again.

emailVerification.sent: Email verification sent! Please check your inbox or junk mail to confirm your email address.
emailVerification.error: Failed to send email verification! Please try again later!

update.success: Your profile has been successfully updated!
update.failed: Failed to update your profile! Please try again!

deleteProfilePicture.failed: Failed to delete profile picture! Please try again!

failure.tooLarge: File size cannot exceed the limit of {{limit}}!

login.t&c: By continuing, you are indicating that you accept our <1>Terms of Service</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>.

doWorkout.workoutCompleteCongratulations: Congratulations, you have completed your workout!
doWorkout.reviewWorkoutResults: Please review your results below and adjust them if anything was entered incorrectly during the workout.
doWorkout.notRecordingResults: You currently aren't recording any results for this workout, if you wish to change that at any point you can do so by

blankExercise.title: Exercises
blankExercise.message: You currently don't have any exercises available! If you wish to add one now, please proceed to the exercises page!

blankWorkout.title: Workouts
blankWorkout.message: Sorry, but you don't have any workouts yet! Please go ahead and create one now!

account.sendVerificationEmail: Click here to send a verification email!

workouts.message: You don't have any workouts yet! Feel free to add one now!

noExercises.message: Sorry, but you need at least one exercise to create a workout!

exercises.message: You don't have any exercises yet! Feel free to add one now!

validation.alphanumeric: Only alphanumeric characters, period and underscore are allowed
validation.mustContainLowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter!
validation.mustContainUppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter!
